short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: 3D Aim Trainer Multiplayer is an exciting online FPS battle shooting game

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The ultimate training ground to improve your aiming skills on shooting. Play this action shooting game with friends or other players online. The game can only start if there are 2 or more players in the lobby
